name: Secret Service System
description:
-STORY-
You are a CIA agent, you have been sent to shelter 404 to check supplies in the shelter. And the door closes with a loud noise. You heard gun sounds but instead of going outside you open Secret Service System Terminal in the Shelter...
Note: This is the FIRST build of the game, so there might be more to add or remove.

-TUTORIAL-
Your objective is to buy a cable from market to fix communication lines.
First, You need to buy a BTC miner from the market. Then You need to make it online through "hardwares". Don't forget! every hardware needs to get online in order to work. When you have enough money, go and buy an energy generator. then, wait for your money to reach 4. Do you run out of energy? Go ahead and buy a battery. Don't forget to use it in Inventory. When You Buy a cable Use it And Discover the rest of the story...
-MENU TUTORIAL-
news - Excluded in Beta
con - Check Connection
quit - exit the game
status - View your money and health.
market - MarketPlace
inv - To use items
hardwares - To set online/ offline hardwares.
